casebody.data:
PEOPLE
v.
ESPINO S235540 Supreme Court of California August 24, 2016 Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Chin, Corrigan, Liu, Cuéllar and Kruger, JJ.

The petition for review is granted. Further action in this matter is deferred pending consideration and disposition of a related *277issue in People v. Macabeo, S221852 (see Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.512(d)(2) ), or pending further order of the court. Submission of additional briefing, pursuant to **224California Rules of Court, rule 8.520, is deferred pending further order of the court. Werdegar, J., was absent and did not participate.
